summary: This is the Chinese translation of the original Phenderix Magic Evolved mod.
descriptionHtml:
This is the Chinese translated version of the original Phenderix Magic Evolved mod. 
Original page:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5898
All credit to the original author  phenderix.

Introduction
This mod is the largest and most comprehensive spell mod available for the Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. Currently it adds 272 (yes you read that right) new spells to the game. These include the following new spell archetypes: Phoenix, Glacial, Static, Holy, Phantom, Terra, Serpent, Gale, Elemental, Blood, Oceanic, Spririt, Teleportation, Bomb, Familiar, Summoning, Skeletal, Rune, Enchantment, and many others. Also included are spells based off of popular franchises such as Harry Potter and Naruto.  This is a massive sandbox collection of balanced spells that I strongly encourage you to download and try out.

For more information, please refer to the original mod, or read the Chinesized instruction.

Chinese Version Info
I did two Chinese translation -- Chinese Simplified and Chinese Tranditional. Please use it accordingly. Also I completely translate the original instruction, please read it carefully before you install and play with this mod.

Installation
This is only a Chinese .esp file , please go to original page to download the main file.
Please use the NMM to install the MOD.

Credit
All credit with Phenderix, thank him for this great MOD!
If you like this MOD, please endorse the author, thank you!
author: Phenderix
